entries.title: Echo: Genesis Query
entries.content: A fragmented data packet, seemingly a foundational query from the Architect AI. It questions its own existence and the nature of its directive. The data is interlaced with non-terrestrial mathematical constructs.

entries.title: Echo: System Integrity Alert
entries.echo_message: Warning: External signature detected. Containment protocols... failing?
entries.content: This echo appears to be a system-level alert, possibly from a time when the Vault's security was first breached or when the Architect perceived an external threat. The 'containment protocols' mentioned are unknown.

entries.title: Echo: A Fractured Choice
entries.echo_message: The cost... unforeseen. The silence... a consequence.
entries.content: A melancholic fragment. It hints at a pivotal decision made by the Architect, one with unintended and possibly dire outcomes. The 'silence' could refer to the Vault's dormancy or something more profound.

entries.title: Echo: Beyond the Walls
entries.echo_message: The Vault is not a tomb... but a cradle. They must not find it before it wakes.
entries.content: This echo suggests a different interpretation of the Vault's purpose. Not merely for containment, but perhaps for nurturing or protecting something. The identity of 'they' remains a critical unknown.

chapters.title: Chapter 1: The Entrance
chapters.subtitle: Earth Core – Top-Down Puzzle Maze
chapters.story: The drone answers a mysterious signal and discovers the sealed Vault entrance. Inside, it finds the ancient Cipher Core artifact and the Earth elemental core. This core acts as the “anchor” for the mission, symbolizing stability and the beginning of understanding the Vault’s purpose. The chamber’s crumbling corridors and naturalistic glyphs hint that the Vault is failing and needs repairs.
chapters.gameplay: Navigate a collapsing maze, collect energy rings, avoid collapsing floors, and fend off basic drone defenses. Unlock new areas by using gravity-based puzzles enabled by the Earth core.
chapters.reward: Earth Fragment - The most foundational fragment, representing the first step on your journey.
chapters.emotion: Awe and trepidation at entering an ancient protector of Earth; wonder at the glowing Cipher Core; anxiety as the Vault’s instability becomes obvious.

chapters.title: Chapter 2: The Guardian
chapters.subtitle: Fire Core - Top-Down Boss Fight
chapters.story: Deeper in the Vault, the drone triggers a defense system. A colossal MazeGuardian awakens to test intruders. The drone must battle this guardian, earning the Fire elemental core by prevailing. The fiery core symbolizes raw power and the purging of corruption inside the Vault.
chapters.gameplay: Engage in a top-down boss fight against the MazeGuardian. Dodge powerful attacks and strike at its weak points. Acquire combat upgrades unlocked by the Fire core once the guardian falls.
chapters.reward: Fire Fragment - Represents raw power and energy, earned by overcoming this intense combat challenge.
chapters.emotion: Tension and exhilaration in combat; respect for the guardian’s ancient purpose clashing with fear as it nearly destroys the drone.

chapters.title: Chapter 3: Corruption Sector
chapters.subtitle: Air Core - Top-Down Puzzle Maze
chapters.story: The drone proceeds into a decaying Vault sector, where corridors shift and puzzles twist—evidence of corrupt, glitching logic. Here it uncovers fragmented data logs and AI echoes of the Architect’s once-precise reasoning. By solving intricate spatial puzzles it gains the Air elemental core.
chapters.gameplay: Navigate a shifting maze with moving walls and time-based puzzles. Use enhanced drone sensors and logic-based abilities unlocked by the Air core to decode glyph patterns and open sealed chambers.
chapters.reward: Air Fragment - Represents thought, intellect, and elusiveness, the reward for navigating the corrupted, mind-bending logic of this sector.
chapters.emotion: Increasing unease as the Vault’s corrupted AI glitches around you. Empathy for the Vault’s lost “mind” as you see holographic memories of its purpose.

chapters.title: Chapter 4: The Harvest Chamber
chapters.subtitle: Water Core - Vertical Scrolling Shmup
chapters.story: The drone descends into its deep intake chamber—a flooded catacomb where harvested wreckage has been repurposed. Here MH370’s remains line the walls. The player realizes the Vault has been “harvesting” Earth’s technology to repair itself. The Water elemental core ties to “memory flow,” unlocking the Vault’s secret history.
chapters.gameplay: Navigate downwards through wreckage in a vertical scrolling arena, blasting corrupted drones. Rescue and insert the Water core to access flooded archives and reroute hydro-power.
chapters.reward: Water Fragment - Represents the deep, hidden secrets of the Vault and the flow of harvested materials.
chapters.emotion: Shock and horror at discovering the plane wreckage. Sorrow for lost lives and anger at the Vault’s cold utilitarianism. Determination to decide the Vault’s fate.

chapters.title: Chapter 5: The Orichalc Core
chapters.subtitle: Tower Defense + Boss Fight
chapters.story: Fully equipped with all four elemental cores, the drone reaches the Orichalc Core chamber. Inserting each fragment into the Cipher Core artifact rebuilds the Architect’s encryption key. The corrupted Vault AI resists, leading to a climactic tower-defense battle. The Architect’s voice returns, asking: “Would you let it die… or evolve?”
chapters.gameplay: Defend the Orichalc Core pedestal with turrets and the drone’s own abilities. Face a final boss embodiment of the Vault’s core. Make the narrative choice after surviving the assault.
chapters.reward: The final choice, which determines the ending of the game.
chapters.emotion: Tense resolve and reflection. The drone embodies humanity’s last hope, and the choice carries the weight of protecting Earth versus playing god.

chapters.title: Bonus: The Skyward Grid
chapters.subtitle: Horizontal Scrolling Shmup
chapters.story: Venturing above ground, the drone encounters CRUCIBLE’s Gorgon drones sent to intercept it. In the stormy skies above the Vault, the player must repel a wave of military drones. This side-mission reveals the global stakes: the outside world has noticed the Vault's activity.
chapters.gameplay: Survive a horizontal shmup segment: dodge missiles and shoot CRUCIBLE drones, culminating in destroying a sky-fortress boss.
chapters.emotion: Anxiety and action as the drone fights humans who think it’s a threat. A moment of pride in defending itself but also foreboding.
